rules_text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Its controller creates a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Starholme rail lines frequently route their passage through sandstorms. It may abrade the exteriors, but it provides ample protection from robbers.[/i]
